title: [Kaldonis's Magic Shoppe]
[Kaldonis's General Store]
[Kaldonis's Outfitting]
[Kaldonis's Smuggled Treasure]
description: Hung silk walls rise from a thickly carpeted floor.  Just above a bird of paradise-filled vase hangs a tropical bloom wreath, and a silk-covered ceiling completes the picture.  An elegant silver jewelry rack and an oversized sea chest stand side by side in the middle of the room.
